name: Company Authorisation List
query:
select 
a1.name as "Business ID:char:100",
a1.year as "Year:int:80", 
a1.business_name as "Business Name:char:200", 
a1.phone_number as "Biz Phone No:char:150",
b2.name as "Forwarder ID:char:150",  
b2.forwarder_name as "Forwarder Name:char:200",
b2.phone_number as "Forwarder Phone No:char:150"
from `tabBusiness Authorisation` as a1 
left join `tabForwarder` as b2 on a1.parent = b2.name
